EmailTemplate.subject: Revision Stress? Get involved in our EXCLUSIVE workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
Feeling stressed out and down due to upcoming exams and all that revision? We're here to help! The Challenge Society have organised a stress management and revision workshop to help you! Learn how to effectively manage stress and how to effectively revise depending on what is best suited to you.
See below for more details!
OR SIGN UP HERE!
WORKSHOPS
Mindfulness and Stress Management
-Exclusive opportunity to learn ways that are SCIENTIFICALLY PROVEN to manage stress.
-Partnering with the Museum of Happiness, we are offering you a one-day-only opportunity to spend an afternoon with Vicky Johnson and Rosa Connor
- You will leave with a tool kit of various tips and techniques to boost your mood and conquer stress
-Fun activities such as mindfulness, meditation and yoga!
Revision tips and techniques
- Learn which revision technique is best suited to you!
- TOP TIPS for revision and how to kill procrastination!
Learn how to STAY MOTIVATED and not crumble under exam stress!
DETAILS
Where?
Roots and Shoots, Walnut Tree Walk, Kennington SE11 6DN
When?
Friday 8th April, 1:30pm to 5:30pm
INTERESTED?
If you want to get involved in this amazing workshop, sign up here!
Feel free to email us on tcs.westlondon@the-challenge.org if you have any questions!
Feel free to bring a fellow grad along too and help them access all of these great things for a happier, less stressful life.
